headline: Italy Braces for Impact As Populist Party Teeters
abstract: The populists who upended Italian politics are struggling with defections, plummeting poll numbers and the compromises of government. What comes next could be worse.
lead_paragraph: ROME â€” Its poll numbers are plummeting. Its members of Parliament are defecting. Its leaders complain about back-stabbing while supporters flee to the left and the right.
